titleStmt.title: A sermon preached before his Maiestie at Dover Castle, on Tuesday the seauenth of Iune 1625. By VVilliam Fuller, B.D. His Maiesties chaplaine, then attending in ordinary. Published by commaund
titleStmt.author: Fuller, William, 1579 or 80-1659.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Edw: Allde for Iohn Hodgets,

notesStmt.note: The first leaf and the last leaf are blank.
Running title reads: A ser. preached at Douer Castle before the King.
Variant: title page has "1625" misplaced following Fuller's titles.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
